Author: brattyfawn
Text: I am, yeah.  - No clue - I’m on the implant and haven’t had a period since September. - Lol, I love salt, so yes - but no more than I have been when I was losing.  - Maybe not. I really should, I probably average maybe a litre a day.   I think maybe I’ve just been fucking up my calorie counts, but I don’t see how I could fuck it up by like ~500 calories a day.

Author: oiyouz
Text: You don’t state that you’re female, but just in case- where are you in your cycle? Has the food you’ve been eating been salty? Have you been drinking enough water? Etc
